name: Ava´s Rune Rescue
description:
Little Ava from Amethysia is looking for her best friend Fynn.
He got lost on its nocturnal flight and can't seem to find its way home.

  • Collect magical runes and parchments
  • Stay away from the toxic bushes and mushrooms
  • Bring Fynn safe back home

How to Install:

  1. Download the .Zip File
  2. Extract the Files
  3. Run the AvasRuneRescue.exe
  4. Have fun!

Credits:

Sound: Epidemic Sound (www.epidemicsound.com)
